com.complexible.common.openrdf
Class OpenRdfIO

java.lang.Object
  com.complexible.common.openrdf.OpenRdfIO

public final class OpenRdfIO
extends java.lang.Object

Collection of utility methods for doing IO operations with RIO and the OpenRdf API. Provides convenience methods to add data to Graph and Repository objects and to write them out to a stream.

Since:
0.1
Version:
1.1
Author:
Michael Grove

readGraph

public static org.openrdf.model.Graph readGraph(java.io.File theFile)
                                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                                org.openrdf.rio.RDFParseException
Read an RDF graph from the specified file

Parameters:
theFile - the file to read from
Returns:
the RDF graph contained in the file
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there was an error reading from the file
org.openrdf.rio.RDFParseException - if the RDF could not be parsed

readGraph

public static org.openrdf.model.Graph readGraph(java.io.InputStream theInput,
                                                org.openrdf.rio.RDFFormat theFormat)
                                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                                org.openrdf.rio.RDFParseException
Read an RDF graph from the stream using the specified format

Parameters:
theInput - the stream to read from
theFormat - the format the data is in
Returns:
the graph represented by the data from the stream
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there is an error while reading
org.openrdf.rio.RDFParseException - if there is an error while trying to parse the data as the specified format

                             java.lang.String theBase)
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             org.openrdf.rio.RDFParseException
Read an RDF graph from the Reader using the specified format. The reader is closed after parsing.

Parameters:
theHandler - the handler for the results of reading the data
theInput - the reader to read from
theFormat - the format the data is in
theBase - the base url for parsing
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there is an error while reading

iterateGraph

public static void iterateGraph(org.openrdf.rio.RDFHandler theHandler,
                                java.io.InputStream theInput,
                                org.openrdf.rio.RDFFormat theFormat)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                org.openrdf.rio.RDFParseException
Iterate over the RDF Graph contained in the input stream, notifying the RDF handler for each statement

Parameters:
theHandler - the RDFHandler to receive notifications of statmements in the graph
theInput - the input to read the RDF from
theFormat - the format of the RDF
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there is an error reading the RDF
org.openrdf.rio.RDFParseException - if it is not valid RDF

                                   org.openrdf.rio.RDFFormat theFormat)
                            throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException,
                                   java.io.IOException

Parameters:
theRepo - the repository to write
theFile - the file to write to
theFormat - the format to write the RDF in
Throws:
org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException - if there is an error getting the data from the repository
java.io.IOException - if there is an error writing to the file
